title: IEEE CS, PES University
description: Developing a hybrid GAN-VAE architecture for artistic style transfer

title: Toyota Kirloskar Motor
description: Developed an automated web scraping and review analysis system using NLTK, used by all the employees reducing manual work time from 6-7 hours to 8-10 seconds
Built a system for real time remote data analysis, cutting down manual work time from 4-5 hours to 5-10 seconds

title: CDSAML, PES University
description: Developed a multi-modal pipeline for converting Kannada speech to English Text
Stages involving Audio denoising, Enhancing, segmenting, Transcripting, Punctuating, Translating, Grammar checking
User can edit the output of each stage or let as it is, so that it's fed as input for successive stage
